  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205241</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Creating and Evaluating Ethnic Advertising</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erstellen und auswertendes ethnisches 
bekanntmachend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Créant et annonçant ethnique d'évaluation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Criando e anunciando étnico de avaliação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Creando e facendo pubblicità etnico di 
valutazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δημιουργία και αξιολόγηση της εθνικής διαφήμισης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Creando y anunciando étnico de evaluación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson students research how advertising agencies market products for different ethnic groups and how they generally target specific audiences. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion erforschen Kursteilnehmer, wie 
Werbebüros Produkte für unterschiedliche ethnische Gruppen 
vermarkten und wie sie im Allgemeinen spezifische Publikum zielen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon les étudiants recherchent 
comment les agences de publicité lancent des produits sur le marché 
pour différents groupes ethniques et comment elles visent 
généralement les assistances spécifiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição os estudantes pesquisam como as 
agências anunciando introduzem no mercado produtos para grupos 
étnicos diferentes e como alvejam geralmente audiências 
específicas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione allievi ricercano come le 
agenzie di pubblicità introducono i prodotti sul mercato per i gruppi
etnici differenti e come designano generalmente i pubblici come 
bersaglio specifici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την έρευνα σπουδαστών μαθήματος πώς 
προϊόντα αγοράς αντιπροσωπειών διαφήμισης για τις διαφορετικές 
εθνικές ομάδες και πώς στοχεύουν γενικά στα συγκεκριμένα 
ακροατήρια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección los estudiantes investigan cómo 
las agencias de publicidad ponen los productos para diversos grupos 
étnicos y cómo apuntan generalmente a audiencias específicas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
